name: Learning Basic Driving Concepts
description:
This game is designed for people with little to no driving experience but would like to learn some basic driving safety concepts such as taking junctions, traffic lights, zebra crossings, and parked cars. Play in an endless runner with first-person driving where the goal is to reach as far as you can until your health bar drop to zero. 

This is an educational game designed for my diss project: Can Digital Game-Based Learning be used to Improve UK Driving Theory: A Machinations Approach.  The game has not been tested fully and may be missing some features.
